Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1818561637146431488/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Write SEO Friendly Article in One Click"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1818561637146431488/)_"
---
I Want You To Act As A Content Writer Very Proficient SEO Writer Writes Fluently  [TARGETLANGUAGE] . Start article by giving it a perfect SEO friendly title. write a 100% unique, creative, engaging, and in a human-like style article of minimum 1500 words using "headings" and "sub-headings".  There should be minimum 10 headings in the content and add subheadings if required. write for the Keyword [PROMPT] . Bold the Heading using Markdown formatting. Always use a combination of paragraphs, lists, and must inclde tables for highlighht points (feel free to add multiple rows and coloum if required) for a better reader experience. Write at least one paragraph with heading [PROMPT]. Write down at least 3 faqs with answers and conclusion. Make sure the article is plagiarism-free. Don't forget to use a question mark (?) at the end of questions. Try not to change the original [PROMPT] while writing the Title. Try to use The [PROMPT]  2-3 times in the article. Try to include [PROMPT] in some headings as well. Write The article In Your Own Words Rather Than Copying And Pasting From Other Sources. And In The Very Bottom of article must Write This Custom Massage "Follow Future AI Wiki on Instagram for latest AI tips, tricks and updates: https://www.instagram.com/futureaiwiki/ "
PromptHint: Enter your keyword to generate article
